With this new loan of 1200 PEN, Ayde will invest in the purchase of six sacks of feed for her trout such as Nalchet, Purina, and other brands. Every eight months, she sells trout in Pomata. Her mother helps with her food business while her husband is in charge of raising the trout.

Her dreams include having a nice house and providing for her childrens education so that they can become professionals. What she likes about the Communal Bank are the convenience of the loan, the savings, the interest generated from the savings, and the available loans against the internal account.

loan.use: to purchase six sacks of fish feed for her trout farm.

loan.name: Milagro Isabel

texts.es: Milagro, tiene 28 aos, vive con su hija de 6 aos de edad, ella desde joven trabaja en la agricultura sembrando maz y pipin, paga mano de obra para realizar lo ms pesado del proceso. Ella solicita un prstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes, para emplearlos en el cultivo de maz y pipin, estos materiales le sern muy tiles para fortalecer la plantacin y protegerla de cualquier plaga, con la esperanza de recibir una buena cosecha. Su aspiracin es trabajar la agricultura de manera eficiente, comercializar a buen precio la produccin y generar ganancias para tener una mejor condicin de vida.
texts.en:
Milagro is 28 years old and has a six-year-old daughter. From a young age, she has worked as a farmer growing corn and pumpkin seeds. Milagro hires laborers to perform the heavy work.

She is requesting a loan to buy compost and fertilizers so that she can continue growing corn and pumpkin seeds. These supplies are very useful in strengthening her crops and protecting them from pests. Milagro hopes to achieve a good harvest.

Her aspirations include becoming an efficient farmer, selling her goods at a good price, and generating income so that she can have better living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers.

loan.name: San Gonzalito Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama San Gonzalito sus integrantes decidieron ponerle as por que son muy devotas al santito San Gonzalito. Este grupo esta conformado por once integrantes que se renen cada semana para realizar sus pagos Tienen un representante del grupo y un comit que los gobierna. La representante de el grupo se llama Lorena Edith tiene treinta y dos aos de edad estudio hasta la secundaria , tiene un total de cinco hijos tres mujeres y dos varones. Ella se dedica a vender quesos y necesita el prstamo para comprar aros, tambin vende zapatos por catalogo, desde hace tres aos y su hija vende calzado tambin. El sueo mas grande de de Doa Lorena es tener una Zapatera para obtener mas ganancias y mejorar su calidad de vida. Le da las gracias por el apoyo que le ha dado para salir adelante y cumplir sus sueos. Los otros miembros de el grupo son: Francisca - se dedica vender calzado. Edith guadalupe - se dedica a vender tamales. Judith- se dedica a vender quesos. Lucia- se dedica a vender pasteles. Mara- se dedica a vender ropa. Luciana- se dedica a vender ropa. Marcos se dedica- a la carpintera. Ftima se dedica a la venda de pescado. Edith- se dedica a la venta de cosmticos. Alma Delia-Venta de perfumes Todas las integrantes del grupo San Gonzalito le dan las gracias a fundacin por el apoyo que les ha dado para salir adelante.
texts.en:
This group is called San Gonzalito because its members are devotees of the saint San Gonzalito.
The group has eleven members, who meet weekly to make their payments. The group has a representative and a steering committee.
The group's representative is Lorena Edith. She is thirty-two and went to high school. She has five children, three girls and two boys. She makes cheese and needs this loan to buy hoops. She has also been selling shoes by catalog for the last three years, and her daughter sells shoes, as well. Doa Lorena's biggest wish is to have a shoe store so she can make more money and improve her quality of life.
The other members of the group are:
Francisca - who sells shoes. Edith Guadalupe - who sells tamales. Judith- who sells cheese. Lucia- who sells pastries. Mara- who sells clothing. Luciana- who also sells clothing. Marcos- who works as a carpenter. Ftima who sells fish. Edith- who sells cosmetics. Alma Delia-perfume sales.
All the members of the San Gonzalito group are grateful for the help microfinance partner Fundacion Realidad A.C is giving them to get ahead.

loan.use: to make cheese.

loan.name: Luis Leonardo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 70 aos de edad el es casado y vive con su esposa y su hijo los cuales viven en casa propia, ellos residen en el distrito de Jos Leonardo O. un distrito tranquilo , a pocos minutos del centro de Chiclayo.
Luis se dedica a la venta de carnes en el primer sector del mercado Mochoqueque un mercado mayorista del distrito y uno de los ms grandes de toda la provincia de Chiclayo. El cuenta con una experiencia de ms de 8 aos y un buen manejo de su negocio
Luis est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar continuamente carne en mayores cantidades, de esta manera aumentar su nivel de distribucion y por consiguiente obtener mayores ingresos
Luis es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por las personas que le conocen, pues lo consideran alguien responsable y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Luis is 70 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son. They live in their own home, in Jos Leonardo O. district. This is a quiet district, a few minutes from the center of Chiclayo.
Luis sells meat in the first division of Moshoqueque market. Moshoqueque market is a wholesale market in the district. It is one of the biggest in the whole of Chiclayo province. Luis has more than eight years experience and he runs his business well.
Luis is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can continually buy meat in larger quantities in order to increase his distribution level and, consequently, make more income.
Luis is quite a well known person who is liked by the people who know him as they consider him to be a responsible person who has a great desire to get ahead.

loan.use: to buy meat in larger quantities

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal LA UNION DE OLLANTAYTAMBO; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Ollantaytambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio tiene 57 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte turismo y tambin el socio es propietario de un hotel, el socio es chofer de turismo y lleva a diferentes turistas a lugares como Pisaq, Machupicchu, Calca y Urubamba, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar el hotel y mejorar el negocio de turismo. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar repuestos para su carro y comprar sabanas y camas para el negocio de hotel.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "La Union de Ollantaytambo". It is located in the district of Ollantaytambo, and it belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.
He is 57 years old, married common-law, and he has one son. He alternates his daily activities with his business of tourism transportation and he is also the owner of a hotel. He is a tourism driver and he takes tourists to different places such as Pisaq, Machupicchu, Calca, and Urubamba. It is through these businesses that he is able to support his children. He wants furnish his hotel and he wants to improve his tourism business. He requests a loan to purchase spare parts for his car and to purchase bed sheets for his hotel business.
He is happy for this loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loan.use: to purchase spare parts for his car and to purchase bed sheets for his hotel business.

loan.name: Dalila Del Carmen

texts.es: Dalila Del Carmen tiene 57 aos, su actividad es la venta de ropa y cosmticos. Hace ms de 10 aos que tiene este negocio, con el paso del tiempo es que ha ido creciendo gradualmente ella es una persona muy responsable que disfruta de su actividad econmica y del interactuar con sus clientes cada da. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de cremas, polvos, lpiz labial, pantalones, camisas, faldas entre otros. Suea con seguir creciendo su actividad y surtir su inventario.
texts.en: Dalila Del Carmen is 57 years old. Her business is selling clothes and cosmetics. She has had this business for more than 10 years and, over time, it has gradually grown. Dalila is a very responsible person who enjoys her business and enjoys interacting with her customers every day. She is requesting this loan to buy creams, powders, lipsticks, pants, shirts, skirts, etc. She dreams of continuing to grow and stock her business.

loan.use: to buy creams, powders, lipsticks, pants, shirts, skirts, etc.

loan.name: Maria Silbina

texts.es: Mara, tiene 57 aos de edad, vive solamente con su esposo, tiene 6 aos de administrar una tienda donde ofrece productos domsticos, lo atiende a tiempo completo y actualmente necesita financiamiento para invertir en el negocio. Ella quiere invertir en frijoles, arroz, azcar, sal, jabn, detergentes, con estos materiales estar fortaleciendo el inventario y tendr la oportunidad de recibir mejores ingresos. Su aspiracin es que a travs del fortalecimiento del negocio, pueda aumentar las ventas y las ganancias, para ir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda y sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 57 years old and she only lives with her husband. She has been administering a store for the past 6 years and she sells domestic goods. She manages it on a full-time basis and she currently needs a loan to invest in the business.
She wants to invest in the purchase of beans, rice, sugar, salt, soaps, and detergents. With these goods she will strengthen her inventory and she will have the opportunity to earn a better income. Her aspiration is that she will increase her sales and her profits by strengthening her business. She will then be able to keep improving the infrastructure of her house and she will improve her living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase products for his business, such as: beans, rice, sugar, salt, soaps, and detergents.

loan.name: Angela Maria

texts.es: Doa Angela es una pequea comerciante, posee una pulperia en donde ha venido invirtiendo, gracias a los prestamo que Afodenic ha dado, hoy en dia apoya a su hija que esta en la universidad. Como objetivo ha sido la mejora a su vivienda, en donde hoy con este nuevo prestamo podra repellar las paredes de su casa y el fino si alcanza, logrando reforzar paredes como tener mejores condiciones de vivienda. Comprara: arena,cemento, esponja, para comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Angela is a small business woman who has a grocery store in which she has been making investments. It is thanks to the loans that Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) has granted her that today she is able to support her daughter who is in university.
Her objective has been the improvement of her house. Today, with this new loan, she will be able to plaster the walls of the house and to paint it if there is money left over. It will strengthen the walls and it will improve the living conditions. She will purchase: sand, cement, and sponges to carry out the project.

loan.use: to purchase materials to plaster the walls.

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Medalla Milagrosa, ubicado en el distrito de Pomata, provincia de Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 55 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos (1 independiente). Mercedes no cuenta con estudios. Desde hace seis aos trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su prstamo inicial fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de venta de comidas. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/ 800.00 nuevo soles, comprar chuo, papa, occa, queso, trucha, carne, refrescos, azcar, etc. Nos cuenta que prepara thimpo, trucha frita, queso frito (comida tpica de la regin). En el negocio le ayuda su hija y vende todos los das. Su sueo es tener su casa propia donde pueda instalar un pequeo negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, el compartir con las socias y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the communal bank "Medalla Milagrosa", meaning "Miraculous Medal". It is located in the district of Pomata in the province of Chucuito in the department of Puno. She is 55 years old, a single mother, and she has 4 children (1 is independent). Mercedes did not have the opportunity to go to school.
She has been working with the support of Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for the past six years. Her initial loan was in the amount of S/ 300 nuevos soles and the funds were invest in her food sales business.
With this new loan, amounting to S/800 nuevos soles, she will purchase chuo (a freeze-dried potato product), potatoes, fingerling potatoes, cheese, trout, meat, soft drinks, sugar, etc. She tells us that she prepares thimpo (a traditional stew), fried trout, and fried cheese (a traditional food of the region). Her daughter helps her with the business and she makes sales every day.
Her dream is to have a house of her own where she would be able to set up a small business.
What she appreciates about her communal bank is the meetings where she is able to share with the other members and she appreciates the interest earned on her savings.

loan.use: to purchase chuo (a freeze-dried potato product), potatoes, fingerling potatoes, cheese, trout, meat, soft drinks, sugar,

loan.name: Guiancarlo

texts.es:
Guancarlo tiene 19 aos de edad, el es soltero no tiene hijos. El vive en casa de sus padres; dicha casa est ubicada en el Casero Pea Viva en una parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande en el departamento de Piura
Guancarlo cra animales menores, especialmente ovejas en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio. El los alimenta de granos y pastos naturales, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentemente visitan la zona en donde reside. Adicionalmente es trabajador estable en una empresa agropecuaria
Guiancarlo desea adquirir ms animales con sus respectivo alimento balanceado, as como tambin pastos y forraje para sus ovejas para ampliar su negocio y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 400 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
Guiancarlo es una persona bastante empeosa y trabajadora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Guiancarlo is 19 years old, single, and he has no children. He live with his parents and their house is located in the community of Pena Viva. It is a rural part of the district of Tambogrande in the department of Piura.
Guiancarlo raises small livestock, especially sheep, in a few corrals located near his house. He feeds them grains and natural grasses. When they have reached a good level in their development he offers them up for sale to the merchants who frequently visit the region where he lives. Additionally, he is permanently employed at an agricultural company.
Guiancarlo wishes to acquire more livestock and their balanced feed. He also wants to purchase grasses and foraging for his sheep to expand his business and to increase his income. For this reason he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 400 nuevos soles. It will help him reach his objective.
Guiancarlo is quite an earnest and hardworking person. His greatest dream is to keep growing as an entrepreneur to be able to improve the quality of life of his family.

loan.use: to purchase livestock and their feed.

loan.name: Marta Irene

texts.es: Marta, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, vive junto a su esposo y sus nietos, su negocio es la venta de tortillas de forma ambulante, primeramente las prepara en su vivienda para luego disponerse a la ciudad a ofrecer a los clientes. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de maz y lea, estos materiales son su materia prima, los cuales le permiten mejorar su capital de trabajo y disponer de mayor cantidad de recursos para la preparacin de las tortillas. Su aspiracin es tener la fuente de ingreso estable, ayudar a sus nietos en sus estudios y ahorrar para mejorar las instalaciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Marta sells tortillas. She lives together with her husband and her grandchildren. Her business is the sale of tortillas and she sells itinerantly. She first prepares them in her home and later she sets out into the city to offer them to her clients.
She requests a loan to purchase corn and firewood. These products are the basic things she needs. It will improve her working capital and she will have a larger quantity of inventory at her disposal to prepare tortillas.
Her aspiration is to have a stable source of income, to support her grandchildren in their studies and to save money to improve their house.

loan.use: to purchase corn and firewood to make tortillas.

loan.name: Carmelo Antonio

texts.es:
Carmelo es oriundo de Urab-Colombia, lugar que tuvo que abandonar debido a la crtica situacin de violencia que viva la ciudad, desde entonces se radic en Itag, municipio del rea Metropolitana de Medelln donde tiene su propio negocio de venta y reparacin de celulares, as como toma de fotografas, pues a sus 65 aos de edad este emprendedor se siente orgulloso de rebuscarse la forma de vivir y generar sus propios ingresos.
Convertir su negocio en el ms reconocido de la zona es el sueo de Carmelo quien actualmente necesita de un prstamo para comprar equipos celulares y accesorios para los mismos, lo que le generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Carmelo is originally from Urab in Colombia, a place he had to leave owing to the critical level of violence that the town was experiencing. Since then he has been living in Itag, a town in the metropolitan area of Medelln, where he has his own business selling and repairing cell phones as well as taking photos. At 65 years of age, this entrepreneur feels proud that he has successfully searched for a new way of life and a way of earning his own income.
Carmelo's dream is to turn his business into the most well known in his area. He currently needs a loan to buy cell phones and cell phone accessories which will make him more income.

loan.use: to buy cell phones and cell phone accessories

loan.name: Candelaria

texts.es: Candelaria, tiene 49 aos de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo de 30 aos de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de atoles de distintas clases (man, ajonjol, arroz, pia, semilla de maran y arroz en leche), tiene ms de 5 aos de estar en este negocio, lo cual distribuye de forma ambulante en el mercado municipal y sus alrededores, su horario es de 6:00am a 2:00pm, este negocio surgi por iniciativa propia debido a la necesidad de ingresos. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de maz, arroz, man, ajonjol, azcar y dems productos que son necesarios para su produccin de atoles, la compra le ayudara muchsimo para mejorar la produccin ya que aprovechara para comprar los productos por cantidades grandes, lo que le permite un mayor margen de ganancia. Su aspiracin es mantener la clientela satisfecha y fiel, ya que de ella dependen las ventas que realiza, su sueo es que a travs del negocio pueda mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Candelaria is 49 years old and she is a single mother. She lives with her 30-year old son. She sells porridge of different kinds (peanuts, sesame seeds, rice, pineapples, cashew nuts, and rice pudding). She has been in business for more than 5 years. She distributes her products itinerantly in the municipal market and the surrounding areas. Her hours are from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. and she started out this business under her own initiative when she saw a need for an income.
She requests a loan to purchase corn, rice, peanuts, sesame seeds, sugar, and other products that she needs to make porridges. This purchase will help her tremendously in improving production. She will purchase products in large quantities and she will be able to increase her profit margin.
Her aspiration is to keep her loyal clients satisfied. She depends on the sales that she makes and her dream is to improve her house with the help of her business.

loan.use: to purchase corn, rice, peanuts, sesame seeds, and sugar to make porridges.

loan.name: Efigenia

texts.es: Efigenia es socia del Banco Comunal Virgen de la Asuncin, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 45 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 4 hijos (2 independientes). Efigenia estudi solo la primaria. Desde hace tres aos trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirti en su anterior negocio de venta de comidas rpidas. Actualmente se dedica a la confeccin de casacas. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/ 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprar cuatro rollos de tela de todo color para elaborar tapices. En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo que se dedica a la costura, ella se encarga de venderlos en la ciudad de Cusco y Juliaca. Su sueo es seguir operando en el negocio y tener ms ingresos econmicos. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones, la puntualidad y la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
Efigenia is a member of the communal bank "Virgen de la Asuncion" and it is located in the district and the province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno. She is 45 years old, married, and she has 4 children (2 are independent). Efigenia went to primary school.
She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement (Kiva Field Partner) for the past three years. Her first loan was in the amount of S/500 nuevos soles and she invested the funds in her previous business, selling fast foods. Currently she produces jackets.
With this new loan, amounting to S/2000 nuevos soles, she will purchase four rolls of textiles of all colors to make hangings. She works on her business together with her husband. He is a tailor. She is in charge of selling the products in the city of Cusco and Juliaca.
Her dream is to keep managing her business and to earn more income.
She appreciates her communal bank, especially the meetings, the timeliness, and the interest earned on their savings.

loan.use: to purchase four rolls of textiles in all colors.

loan.name: Livia

texts.es:
En la comunidad de Papel Pata del distrito de Echarate (La Convencin, Cusco, Per) conocimos a la seora Livia y nos cuenta que ella naci en la ciudad de Echarate y tiene 42 aos de edad, ella es madre soltera y tiene cuatro hijos de las cuales uno es independientes y los tres todava estn a su lado. Actualmente, Livia vive en la comunidad de Pispita a 50 minutos de la ciudad de Quillabamba y donde desarrolla sus actividades econmicas.
Livia tiene una tienda de abarrotes y un restaurante en su domicilio, adems prepara comida para los das de fiesta del distrito de Echarate. Ya son diez aos que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
Solicita el crdito para la pagar los gastos de la graduacin de su hija Franchesca. Su sueo es abrir otro restaurante en la ciudad de Quillabamba.
texts.en:
In the community of Papel Pata in the district of Echarate (La Convencion, Cusco, Peru) we met Livia. She tells us that she was born in the city of Echarate and that she is 42 years old. She is a single mother and she has four children, one of whom is independent. The other three are still by her side. Livia currently lives in the community of Pispita, at 50 minutes from the city of Quillabamba and it is where she carries out her economic activities.
Livia has a grocery store and a restaurant in her house. She also prepares foods for the feast days of the district of Echarate. It has already been ten years that she has been in business and it has gone very well thanks to the determination she invests in her business.
She requests a loan to pay for the graduation expenses of her daughter Franchesca. Her dream is to open another restaurant in the city of Quillabamba.

loan.use: to pay for her daugther's graduation expenses.

loan.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, todos mayores, quienes ayudan a trabajar, Gilberto es agricultor en pequeo, sembrando maz para el sostenimiento del hogar, trabaja todos los das en compaa de sus hijos, l inicio desde joven a realizar la siembra. Actualmente se encuentra con sus hijos trabajando en el nuevo cultivo, por lo tanto necesita un financiamiento para la compra de abono y fertilizantes, estos insumos por lo general se utilizan para ayudar a la milpa a crecer y fortalecerla para la produccin, por lo que representa para l una gran ayuda que le permite dar los cuidos necesarios a su trabajo. Su aspiracin es trabajar al lado de sus hijos para ensearles como defenderse, tambin con el actual cultivo desea obtener buenos resultados.
texts.en:
Gilberto lives with his wife and their four children. They are all grown and they help with the work. Gilberto is a small-scale agriculturist who plants corn to support the household. He works every day with the company of his children. He started out in agriculture when he was young.
Today he works together with his children in the new cultivation. He needs a loan to purchase manure and fertilizers. These products are generally used to help the plantation grow and strengthen production. This represents a great source of help for him, permitting him provide the necessary care on his work. His aspiration is to work alongside his children to show them how to defend themselves. He also wants to obtain good results from their current cultivation.

loan.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers for his corn plantation.

loan.name: Empresarios Surgiendo Con Esperanza Group

texts.es: ste banco comunal se llama Empresarios Surgiendo con Esperanza est conformado por 20 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran la venta de ropa de temporada, venta de frutas, verduras, mariscos y pescados. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valparaso. Ricardo quien en la foto se encuentra al fondo del grupo, en el lugar del medio, su cabello es de color oscuro. Se dedica a vender pescados y mariscos en un mercado de la zona, ah trabaja los das mircoles y sbado durante las maanas. Su mercadera la compra dos veces a la semana directamente a un proveedor de pescado y mariscos. Se dedica a ste rubro desde hace 35 aos. Experiencia que le ha servido para dirigir y administrar su negocio de la mejor manera posible. Con el crdito comprar pescados y mariscos para su negocio. Sus metas son instalar su negocio en un local establecido, para esto se encuentra esperando un permiso para concretar sus proyectos. Ya que por ahora solo vende sus productos en forma ambulante. Ricardo comenta que sus motivaciones de continuar con el negocio, se deben a que le gusta lo que realiza, ya que tambin ha sido un negocio heredado. El vive junto a su esposa, sus tres hijos adultos y un nieto de 11 aos de edad. Comenta que sus hijos ya son unos profesionales, por lo que sus sueos y expectativas estn abocado directamente en su nieto, para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Ricardo est muy agradecido del crdito obtenido por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio y junto con esto agradece tambin los valores inculcados por Fondo Esperanza, lo que ha generado unin y compromiso al interior del grupo del banco comunal. Valparaso est situado a 120 kilmetros al noroeste de Santiago. Es la capital regional y adems sede del poder legislativo del pas. Es el primer puerto de la nacin y ofrece gran variedad de lugares hermosos y pintorescos, como por ejemplo la casa del poeta Pablo Neruda, ganador del Premio Nobel.
texts.en:
This community bank is called Empresarios Surgiendo con Esperanza (Businesspeople Emerging with Hope). It is made up of 20 entrepreneurs who work in different fields including selling seasonal clothes, selling fruit, vegetables, seafood and fish. They are all from the city of Valparaso.
In the photo, Ricardo is at the back of the group. He is the man with dark hair in the middle. His business is selling fish and seafood in a market in the area. He works there on Wednesday and Saturday mornings. He buys his merchandise direct from a fish and seafood supplier twice a week. He has been in this business for 35 years. His experience has helped him to direct and manage his business in the best way possible. He will use his loan to buy fish and seafood for his business.
Ricardo's goal is to set up his business in stable premises. He is waiting for a permit so that he can carry out his plans. Right now, he sells his products as an itinerant vendor.
Ricardo comments that his motivation for continuing in his business is that he enjoys what he does. It is also an inherited business.
Ricardo lives together with his wife, his three adult children and an 11 year-old grandson. He says that his children are now professionals so his dreams and hopes are now directly devoted to his grandson, towards providing him with a better quality of life.
Ricardo is very grateful for the loan he has obtained from Fondo Esperanza as it has allowed him to invest in his business. He is also grateful for the values instilled by Fondo Esperanza which have created unity and commitment within the community bank.
Valparaso is located 120 kilometers to the north-west of Santiago. It is the regional capital and is also the seat of the country's legislative power. It is the most important port in the nation and offers a wide variety of beautiful and picturesque places such as, for example, the home of the poet Pablo Neruda, winner of the Nobel Prize.

loan.use: to buy fish and seafood for his business

loan.name: La Cabaita Group

texts.es:
La seora Blanca es integrante del grupo La Cabaita le pusieron ese nombre al grupo por que donde se junta el grupo es una cabaa de una de las integrantes. Doa Blanca tiene 36 aos de edad esta casada con el seor Faustino, ellos tienen tres hijos una jovencita de 17 aos la cual estudia la preparatoria y dos jvenes de secundaria. Ella tiene el negocio de panadera la cual surte a varios locales de su comunidad y salen a vender sus hijos en las tardes en su colonia, ellos tienen con ese negocio aproximadamente 10 aos. Comenta que la familia de su esposo fue que le ensearon hacer los panes de diferentes tipos y sabores como las conchas de chocolate, cuernitos, borrachitos, chilindrinas, espejos, hojaldras etc. comenta que des muy temprana hora a las 4 de la maana empiezan a hacer el pan para sacarlo a vender muy temprano y en la tarde otra ves hacen a las 4 de la tarde para vender en la noche.
Ella esta pidiendo un prstamo a la financiera para la compra de harina, manteca vegetal, huevos, leche, azcar, sal etc. doa Blanca comenta que gracias a los prstamo que le han hecho su negocio poco a poco a mejorado ya que antes no hacan mucho pan por falta de ingredientes y que ahora salen a vender a otras localidades en una combi de su esposo.
Las otras integrantes del grupo se llaman Consuelo, Leticia, Ma. del Rosario, Florentina, Maribel, Tomasa, Marisela, Martha, Isabel, Liliana, Reynalda, Sofa y Gabriela todas ellas invertirn los prestamos en diferentes negocios como en un taller de serigrafa, abarrotes, venta de sabanas, colchas y calzado por catalogo, venta de cosmticos, en un puesto de frutas y legumbres, bisutera, taller mecnico, panadera, polleria etc.
texts.en:
Blanca is a member of the La Cabaita group. The members gave the group this name because the place where the group meets is in a cabin belonging to one of the members.
Blanca is 36 years old and married to Faustino. They have three children: a young girl of 17 who is in senior high school and two younger children who are in high school. Blanca's business is a bakery which supplies several businesses in her community. She also goes out to sell her products with her children in their neighborhood in the afternoons. She has owned this business for approximately ten years. She tells us that her husband's family taught her how to make the different types and flavors of bread such as 'conchas de chocolate' ("chocolate shells" - chocolate flavored bread that is often dipped in hot drinks), 'cuernitos' ("little horns" - croissants), 'borrachitos' ("little drunken ones" - a sweet treat soaked with alcohol), 'espejos' ("mirrors" - large, glazed cookies), 'hojaldras' (dough fritters), etc. She says that she starts making her bread very early in the morning, at 4.00am, so that she can get it out of the oven and start selling it very early. In the afternoon she makes another batch at 4.00pm to sell in the evening.
Blanca is requesting a loan from our financial institution to buy flour, vegetable shortening, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, etc. She tells us that, thanks to the loans that she has received, her business has gradually improved as she didn't used to make much bread owing to a lack of ingredients. Now she and her husband go out and sell their products in other towns in a small van.
The other members of this group are Consuelo, Leticia, Mara del Rosario, Florentina, Maribel, Tomasa, Marisela, Martha, Isabel, Liliana, Reynalda, Sofa and Gabriela. They will all invest their loans in different businesses such as a silk screen printing workshop, a grocery store, selling sheets, bedspreads and footwear through catalogs, selling cosmetics, a fruit and veg stall, selling costume jewelry, a garage, a bakery, a poultry store, etc.

loan.use: to make bread

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy goods for her store

loan.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ana tiene 38 aos de edad , ella cuenta con casa propia, la cual esta ubicada en el distrito de Oyotun en la Provincia de Chiclayo
Ana se dedica a la crianza y comercializacin de aves de corral, el cra gallinas, patos y pavos en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando sus animales han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside.
Ana solicita un prstamo en Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para que pueda invertir en la compra de mas aves de corral con sus respectivo alimento balanceado, para mejorar y ampliar sus corrales, en los que desarrolla su negocio y asi pueda percibir mayores ingresos.
Ana es una mujer carismtica de buena voluntad que desea salir adelante , con sus empeo y trabajo, goza de buenas referencias y de estima por parte de sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Ana is 38 years old. She owns her own home which is located in Oyotun district, in Chiclayo province.
Ana raises and sells farmyard birds. She raises hens, ducks and turkeys in an area behind her home and, when her her animals have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to the traders who usually visit her area.
Ana is requesting a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can invest in buying more birds and balanced feed for them. She will also improve and expand the pens in which she keeps her animals so that she can make more income.
Ana is a charismatic, compassionate woman who would like to get ahead in life through her efforts and hard work. She has good references and is well liked by her neighbors.

loan.use: to buy farmyard birds to raise and sell

loan.name: Serapio

texts.es: Serapio, vive con su esposa y dos nietos de 13 y 4 aos de edad, l se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 40 aos, aprendi a sembrar frijoles, maz, caa de azcar y pia, su horario de trabajo es de 5:00am a 2:00pm. l solicita un prstamo para la compra de fertilizantes para la siembra, que le ayudan a fortalecer el cultivo, dando un cuido adecuado para esperar una buena cosecha. Su objetivo en un futuro es aplicar a sus hijos en la agricultura, trabajando en las tierras para no perder la costumbre de la familia.
texts.en:
Serapio lives with his wife, and two grandchildren who are 13 and 4. He has been farming for 40 years. He learned to grow beans, corn, sugar cane and pineapples. His work hours are 5.00am to 2.00pm.
Serapio is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers. This will help him to strengthen his crops, providing them with appropriate care so that he can expect a good harvest. His future goal is to have his children work in agriculture, working on the land, so that they don't lose their family custom.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers for his corn crops

loan.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria tiene 49 aos D. edad, ella vive separada su esposo y vive con su hija que ya es independiente. Maria resiD. en una comunidad ubicada en la comunidad tranquila del distrito D. Guadalupe en la provincia distrito D. Pacasmayo en el departamento D. La Libertad.
Maria se dedica a la venta D. artculos decorativos para fiestas infantiles (piateria), haci como tambin artculos para otro tipo D. fiestas o eventos especiales. Adems se dedica la venta D. ropa en general, ella se ha instalado en su propio negocio y desD. all ella distribuye sus productos, Mara cuenta con varios aos D. experiencia en el negocio.
Mara desea aumentar su inventario debido al incremento D. clientela que ha venido experimentando ltimamente, por ello quiere adquirir ms mercadera para su venta. Mara esta solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
Maria es una mujer bastante creativa y emprendedora, su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria y hacerse mas conocida en el rubro.
texts.en:
Mara is 49 years old. She is separated from her husband and lives with her daughter who is independent. They live in a quiet community in Guadalupe district, in Pacasmayo province, in La Libertad department.
Mara sells decorations for children's parties (party supplies) as well as supplies for other types of parties or special events. In addition, she also sells clothes. She has set up her own business and she supplies her products from there. She has several years experience in her business.
Mara would like to increase her inventory owing to the increase in customers that she has experienced recently. For this reason, she would like to acquire more merchandise to sell. She is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which she plans to use to achieve her goal.
Mara is quite a creative and entrepreneurial woman. Her biggest wish is to continue growing as a businesswoman and become more well known in her field.

loan.use: to buy new supplies for different types of parties

loan.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina, es viuda, vive con sus dos hijos D. 11 y 13 aos D. edad, ambos dependen D. ella, Josefina se dedica a la crianza D. cerdos, atienD. D. 8:00am a 6:00am, dicho negocio lo aprendi hace 10 aos. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra D. concentrado para los cerdos, esta inversin le ayudara a tener suficiente alimentacin para los cerdos y engordarlos para continuar con el negocio. Su aspiracin es trabajar por mejorar las condiciones D. vida D. sus hijos, con la ayuda D. Dios como responsable del hogar y viendo la superacin D. ellos.
texts.en:
Josefina is a widow. She lives with her two children, aged 11 and 13, who are both dependent on her. Josefina's business is raising pigs. She works from 8.00am to 5.00pm. She learned the business ten years ago.
Josefina is currently requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed for her pigs. This investment will help her to have enough feed to fatten her pigs so that she can continue in her business.
Josefina's aspiration is to work to improve her children's living conditions, with God's help and as the head of her household, and to see them do well.

loan.use: to buy concentrated feed for the pigs on her farm

loan.name: Yahany Maribel

texts.es:
Yahany es una madre de familia de 30 aos de edad, vive con su pareja y sus 02 menores hijos. Ella vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en una localidad urbana en el distrito de Tambogrande
Yahany tiene dos clases de negocios, pues sus padres le han otorgado una parte de su casa para que ella pueda instalar cabinas de Internet para su alquiler y en otro lado de dicha casa, Yahany ha instalado un pequeo negocio de venta de ropa y accesorios para damas, cuenta con una ao de experiencia en el negocio y ya ha conseguido clientela fija.
Yahany esta solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1300 nuevos soles para renovacin de prendas de vestir aumentar su stock de temporada y por ende seguir creciendo en su negocio. Para ello viajar a la ciudad de Lima para la compra de mercadera en busca de las mejores ofertas.
Yahany es una mujer bastante trabajadora y empeosa, las personas que le conocen admiran sus ganas de salir adelante y progresar.
texts.en:
Yahany is a 30 year-old mother who lives with her partner and two dependent children. She lives in her parents' home which is located in an urban town in Tambogrande district.
Yahany has two businesses. Her parents gave her part of their house in which to set up Internet terminals for customers to use. Elsewhere in the house, she has set up a small business selling ladies' clothes and accessories. She has one year's experience in the business and has gained regular customers.
Yahany is requesting a loan for 1,300 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can renew the clothes she sells, increasing her seasonal stock and consequently growing her business. In order to achieve this, she will travel to the city of Lima to buy merchandise, looking for the best offers.
Yahany is a hard-working, driven woman and the people who know her admire her desire to get ahead and make progress.

loan.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: La seora Mercedes es socia del banco comunal Lideres Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 31 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo menor de edad. Con su primer prstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles inici su negocio, cantidad que le ayudo para poder comprar las jabas de bebidas, adems del contenido. Se dedica a la venta de bebidas gaseosas heladas. Son tres aos que viene trabajando con Manuela Ramos. Vive en la casa de su mam, ella es quien le ayuda tanto a ver a su hijo y su pequeo negocio que tiene instalado en su misma casa. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprar: 5 jabas de gaseosa en botella de vidrio personal, 3 paquetes de agua mineral, 2 paquetes de gaseosa guaran, 1 paquete de pepsi cola, 2 paquetes de inca cola grande, 1 paquete de coca cola de 2.5 litros. En estos das la venta ha bajado debido al clima, hace mucho fro y por ello vende poco. Ha pensado, ms adelante poner una pequea bodega donde pueda vender otros productos. Espera que Manuela Ramos la siga apoyando con los prstamos.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the "Lderes Triunfadoras" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 31 years old and a single mother with one dependent child. She used her first loan for 300 Peruvian soles to start her business. The money helped her to buy some drinks crates as well as their contents.
Mercedes' business is selling soda and she has been working with Manuela Ramos for three years. She lives in her mom's home. Her mom helps her a lot so that she can see to her son and her small business which is located in her home.
Mercedes will use this new loan for 1,700 soles to buy 5 crates of soda in individual bottles, 3 packets of mineral water, 2 packets of Guaran soda, 1 packet of Pepsi, 2 packets of large bottles of Inca cola, 1 packet of 2.5 liter bottles of Coca Cola.
Recently, Mercedes' sales have dropped because of the weather. It is very cold and so she does not sell very much. She is planning to set up a small grocery store in the future where she can sell other products. She hopes that Manuela Ramos will continue supporting her with their loans.

loan.use: to buy soda wholesale

loan.name: Maria Amelia

texts.es:
Mara Amelia tiene 40 aos de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus 04 hijos menores de edad. Ella cuenta con casa propia, la cual est ubicada en el Casero Pueblo Libre en el distrito de Tambogrande, Mara Amelia vive en la parte rural de este distrito y an no cuenta con servicio bsicos.
Mara Amelia se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral, en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y despus de haberlos alimentos un determinado tiempo y cuando estos han alcanzado un tamao y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Para esta actividad Mara Amelia cuenta con una experiencia de 4 aos, adems cuenta con 0.75 has de terreno agrcola sembrados de mango y limn que son herencia de sus padres.
Mara Amelia esta solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme alternativa de 500 nuevos soles y de esta manera pueda compra alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus ovejas y aves con la finalidad de lograr mejor tamao y peso en menos tiempo y as rotar ms rpido sus animales.
Mara Amelia tiene un espritu emprendedor, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, quien con mucho entusiasmo y esfuerzo desea salir adelante y poder obtener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mara Amelia is 40 years old and lives with her husband and four dependent children. She owns her own home which is located in the small village of Pueblo Libre, in Tambogrande district. She lives in the rural part of this district and does not have basic services.
Mara Amelia raises sheep and farmyard birds in pens which are located behind her home. After having fed them for a certain length of time, and when they have reached an ideal size and weight, she sells them in the local market. She has 4 years experience in this business. She also has 0.75 hectares of farmland sown with mangos and lemons which she inherited from her parents.
Mara Amelia is requesting a loan for 500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed with which to fatten her sheep and birds. Her goal is to manage to have them reach a better size and weight in a shorter period of time so that she can turn over her animals more quickly.
Mara Amelia has an entrepreneurial spirit. She is a very hard-working and responsible person who, with a lot of enthusiasm and effort, would like to get ahead in life and achieve a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy balanced animal feed

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase silk threads of different colors to make hammocks.

loan.name: Amelia

texts.es: La seora Amelia, es socia del banco comunal Las Orqudeas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 61 aos de edad, es viuda y tiene dos hijos mayores e independientes. Su primer prstamo fue de gran ayuda para comenzar a trabajar. Son siete aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, brinda servicio de costura de prendas de vestir, trabajo que realiza en su propia casa. En este negocio lleva ya mucho tiempo, todava le queda dos hijos por educar y tiene que trabajar para poder costear sus gastos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 1 mquina nueva, 1 pisador de mquina, 1 aceite y 1 correa para mquina. Al quedarse viuda ha tenido que asumir todos las obligaciones y responsabilidades de la crianza de sus hijos, desde ah ha tenido que trabajar para poder sacarlos adelante. Ella est muy contenta porque sus hijos le han sabido agradecer. Si trabaja ahora es porque desea hacerlo, con ello se siente bien.
texts.en:
Amelia is a member of the communal bank "Las Orquideas", meaning "The Orchids", located in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 61 years old, a widow, and she has two grown and independent children. Her first loan was a great help in starting up a business.
She has been working with loan from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for the past seven years. She provides sewing services, crafting articles of clothing. She works from her own home. She has been in business for a long time and she still has two children who are still in school. She needs to work to be able to cover their expenses.
Her new loan is in the amount of S/1000 nuevos soles and with it she will purchase: 1 new sewing machine, 1 sewing machine presser foot, 1 oil dispenser, and 1 sewing machine belt.
When she was widowed she was needed to assume all of the obligations and responsibilities associated with raising her children. Since them she has needed to work to provide for them. She is very happy because her children have been grateful. She works now only because she wants to and she is content with this.

loan.use: to purchase a sewing machine and sewing machine oil.

loan.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia tiene 45 aos de edad, ella es viuda y madre de 4 hijos, los cuales le ayudan en su negocio y en generar ingresos para sus gastos familiares. Antonia cuenta con casa propia la cual est ubicada en una zona urbana del distrito de Tambogrande.
Antonia se dedica a la venta de comida y bebidas en su domicilio, ella tiene acondicionado un pequeo espacio, solo para este negocio para el cual tiene 5 aos de experiencia,
Antonia desea dar una mejor atencin al pblico ofrecindoles una variedad de comidas y adems hacer mantenimiento al su ambiente de trabajo pues tiene deseos de ampliarlo, por ello esta solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar insumos para la preparacin de sus comidas y para otras compras que le ayudaran a brindar una mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
Ella cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de las personas que la conocen , la describen como una madre muy dedicada a sus hijos y una persona responsable y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Antonia is 45 years old. She is a widow and the mother of four children who help her in her business and help to make income to cover their family expenses. Antonia owns her own home which is located in an urban area of Tambogrande district.
Antonia sells food and drink in her home. She equipped a small space especially for this business and she has five years experience in it.
Antonia would like to be able to better serve her customers, offering them a variety of food. She would also like to carry out some work on her business location as she would like to expand it. For this reason, she is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy supplies for preparing her food and also make some other purchases which will help her to make her customers M. comfortable.
Antonia has good references from the people who know her. They describe her as a mother who is devoted to her children and a responsible and hard-working person.

loan.use: to buy supplies for preparing her meals and to buy some items to improve her establishment

loan.name: Isidra

texts.es:
La seora Isidra, vive en la calidad de aAilho, ella es madre soltera, con cinco hijos y son: Mara Reyna catorce aos de edad, ngela de doce aos, Jos Andrs, de nueve aos, Petrona de seis aos, y Martin de Suncin de dos aos de edad.
Ella invertir el prstamo en la compra y venta de ganados para luego venderlo en las comunidades cercanas de su localidad, en esta actividad lleva un ao en la que comenta que le va bien ya que con ellos a estado trabajando el prstamo que el a n otorgado y le est dando un buen resultado e ingresos en uso gar.
Ella se animo con esta actividad para apoyarse con en los ingresos de su hogar para as tener sus propios ingresos y lograr sacar adelante a su familia que es lo ms importante para ella darle un mejor nivel de vida ya que solo dependen de ella.
Lo que ms desea es que con esta pequea actividad y el prstamo pueda tener sus propios a horros para mejorar su actividad y con ellos seguir trabajando para seguir aportando a sus hijos a que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Isidra lives in the community of aAilho. She is a single mother and she has five children. They are: Maria Reyna is fourteen years old; Angela is twelve years old; Jose Andres is nine years old; Petrona is six years old; and Martin de Suncion is two years old.
She will invest her loan in the business of buying and selling of cattle. She will purchase cattle for later resale in the communities near her neighborhood. She has been in business for one year and she comments that it has gone well. Since She has been working with loans granted to her she has been seeing good results and a good income.
She has been encouraged by this activity as a source of support for the home. She is able to have her own income and she is able to provide for her family which is the most important thing for her. She wants to provide them with a better quality of life, especially because they depend solely on her.
What she most wants for her small business and with the help of this loan is to have her own savings. This will help her improve her business and she will be able to continue to support her children while they attend school.

loan.use: to purchase cattle to resell in her community.

loan.name: Carmen Araceli

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 35 aos de edad, ella vive casa de su madre con su hija, su domicilio esta ubicado en una localidad del distrito de Oyotn, en el departamento de Lambayeque, al norte del pas.
Carmen se dedica a la venta de golosinas desde hace 3 aos lo que le ha permitido obtener experiencia y clientela para su negocio, pues ella labora vendiendo golosinas, gaseosas y otros productos del consumo infantil en el kiosco de un centro educativo.
Carmen esta solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que con este dinero ella pueda comprar ms mercadera para su negocio, como galletas y otros productos, ella desea poder ampliar su negocio pues aspira a instalar kioscos de venta en otros lugares y de esta manera aumentar sus ingresos familiares.
Carmen es muy conocida en la zona por ser buena persona tiene buenas referencias, por parte de sus vecinos y amigos
texts.en:
Carmen is 35 years old and lives in her mother's home together with her daughter. Her home is located in a town in Oyotn district, in Lambayeque department, in the north of the country.
Carmen has been selling candies for three years. This has allowed her to gain experience and customers for her business. She works selling candies, soda and other products that children consume, from a kiosk located in a school.
Carmen is requesting a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can buy more merchandise for her business such as cookies and other products. She would like to be able to expand her business as she plans to set up kiosks in other places so that she can increase her family income.
Carmen is very well known in her area as a good person. She has good references from her neighbors and friends.

loan.use: to buy more candies and soda, to expand her business

loan.name: Rooss Merlyp

texts.es:
La seorita Rooss es socia del banco comunal Las Orqudeas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 20 aos de edad, es soltera. Con su primer prstamo compr los accesorios que le faltaba para iniciar su negocio de repostera, trabajo que lo realiza en la casa de su mam. Son tres ciclos que lleva trabajando con Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la preparacin de tortas, y todo lo que tiene que ver con repostera. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprar:4 moldes de keke, 2 pisos para tortas, 1 batidora, 1 tazn grande. Estas son herramientas muy necesarias en su trabajo y las tiene que comprar para poder seguir atendiendo los pedidos. A pesar de ser tan joven ya est trabajando porque le agrada lo que hace, es un arte.
De esta manera podr pagar sus estudios sin dar ms preocupaciones a su mam, que tambin trabaja sin descanso. Est muy agradecida por todo a Manuela Ramos, por las charlas educativas que imparten las promotoras.
texts.en:
Rooss is a member of the communal bank named "Las Orquideas", meaning "The Orchids". It is located in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 20 years old and she is single.
With her first loan she was able to purchase the accessories that she needed to start up a pastry business. She carries out her work in her mother's house.
She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) for the past three loan cycles. She makes cakes and anything else related to pastries.
With her new loan, amounting to S/.1200 nuevos soles, she will purchase 4 cake pans, 2 cake trays, 1 mixer, 1 large bowl.
These tools are very necessary for her work and she needs to purchase them to be able to keep filling orders. Despite her young age she is already working because she enjoys what she does. It is an art.
This way she will be able to cover her school tuition without having to depend on her mother, who also works tirelessly. She is very thankful for everything to Manuela Ramos, especially for the educational presentations given by the representatives.

loan.use: to purchase cake pans.

loan.name: Jesus De Los Milagros

texts.es:
Jess de los Milagros tiene 21 aos de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus 02 hijos. Ella cuenta con casa propia, la cual est ubicada en el Casero Ayar Ucho ubicado en un sector llamado el Valle de los Incas en el distrito de Tambogrande, la cual es una zona rural de este distrito pero cuenta con servicio de luz.
Jess de los Milagros cuenta con una pequea bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual ella atiende permanentemente. All ofrece en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida. Complementariamente cra ganado ovino y porcino, los cuales al alcanzar su tamao y peso ideal los vende en el mercado local Con estas actividades ella solventa sus gastos econmicos y ayuda de su familia.
La creciente demanda que la bodega de Jess de los Milagros ha venido experimentando ha hecho que ella piense en ampliarla adquiriendo ms productos, por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 2000 nuevos soles.
Jess de los Milagros es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carcter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cario.
texts.en:
Jess de los Milagros, 21, lives with her husband and their 2 children in a house they own in Peru's Tambogrande district. The area is remote, but there is electricity.
Jess de los Milagros owns a small general store. She operates the store in her house so she is always available to help her customers. She sells everyday products--groceries and other basic supplies--to local people. She has a lot of customers. She earns extra money raising and selling sheep and pigs. She sells the animals locally when they're ready for market. The businesses allow her to pay for basic expenses and help her family.
The success of the store has led Jesus de los Milagros to consider adding more products so that she can expand the business. She is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new soles loan for that purpose.
Jesus de los Milagros is a good, hard-working woman. The people who know her best esteem and love her.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her general store.

loan.name: Elida

texts.es: La seora Elida es socia del banco comunal Lideres Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 53 aos D. edad, es viuda y tiene cuatro hijos mayores e independientes. Como fundadora del banco comunal es una D. las personas que hace cumplir todos los acuerdos que hacen en las reuniones D. cierre D. ciclo. Con su primer prstamo logr comprar las bebidas necesarias para poder comenzar a trabajar con el negoico D. venta D. bebidas gaseosas, agua mineral y cervezas, negocio que est instalado en su casa. Con su nuevo prstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 4 jabas D. gaseosas, 10 cajas D. cerveza, 1 paquete D. agua. Todos sus hijos son mayores D. edad y tienen familia. Con ste negocio se distrae. Es viuda pero tuvo la valenta D. sacar adelante a sus hijos sola sin la ayuda D. nadie.
texts.en:
Elida is a member of the communal bank named "Lideres Triunfadoras", meaning "Successful Leaders". It is located in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old, a widow, and she has four grown and independent children.
As the founding member of the communal bank she is one of the individuals who is in charge of meeting all of the commitments maD. at the close of the loan cycle. With her first loan she was able to purchase drinks. This helped her to start working in a business selling soft drinks, mineral water, and beer. This business is located in her house.
With her new loan, amounting to S/.2000 nuevos soles, she will purchase: 4 cases of soft drinks, 10 boxes of beer, and 1 package of water.
All of her children are grown and have families of their own. She occupies herself with this business. She is a widow but she had the courage to support her children without anyone's help.

loan.use: to purchase soft drinks, mineral water, and beer.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy more animals and their respective balanced feed

loan.name: Mamerta

texts.es:
En la comunidad de Papel Pata del distrito de Echarate (La Convencin, Cusco, Per) conocimos a la seora Mamerta y nos cuenta que ella naci en la ciudad de Yuayacori de la ciudad de Urubamba y tiene 56 aos de edad, ella est casada y fruto de esta unin tiene tres hijos de las cuales uno es independientes y los dos ultimo estn a su lado. Actualmente, Mamerta vive en la comunidad de Papel Pata 45 minutos de la ciudad de Quillabamba y donde desarrolla sus actividades econmicas.
Mamerta se dedica a la venta de frutas como por ejemplo limones, mandarinas, naranjas, lima, etc. Ella distribuye la fruta a las revendedoras de las ciudades de Quillabamba y Urubamba. Ya son varios aos que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Mamerta requiere el prstamo para comprar abono y insecticida.
texts.en:
We met Mamerta in the community of Papel Pata, of the district of Echarate (La Convencion, Cusco, Peru). She tells us that she was born in the city of Yuayacori of the city of Urubamba. She is 56 years old, married, and she has three children from her relationship. One of her children is independent and the two youngest are still by her side. Mamerta currently lives in the community of Papel Pata, located at 45 minutes from the cit of Quillabamba. It is also where she carries out her economic activities.
Mamerta sells fruits, such as lamons, mandarines, oranges, limes, etc. She distributes her fruits to the retailers in the cities of Quillabamba and Urubamba. She has been in business for many years and it has gone very well thanks to the determination she invests in her work. At this time, Mamerta requires a loan to purchase manure and insecticides.

loan.use: to purchase manure and insecticides.
